Ekanālā：A brahmin village near Dakkhināgiri，to the south of Rājagaha．

Once，during the eleventh year of his ministry，the Buddha visited the village and preached to Kāsī-Bhāradvāja the sutta which bears his name and which converted him to the faith （Sn.pp.12ff； SnA.i.136； S.i.172ff）．

Near the village was the Dakkhinagiri-vihāra．SA.i.188.
